job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtCandidates that do not meet or exceed the minimum stated requirements skillsexperience will be displayed to customers but may not be chosen for this opportunityltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtMinimum Requirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt8 years Hands on development of Machine Learningltligtltligt4 years Provide administration support for ML environment MLOps which includes installation configuration upgrades and business continuity support in AWS Cloudltligtltligt4 years Experience creating scripts to automate ML administration tasks schedules and deployment activitiesltligtltligt4 years Demonstrated experience with Linux administration and troubleshooting activitiesltligtltligt2 years Excellent oral and written communication skillsltligtltligt2 years Effectively manage multiple responsibilities prioritize conflicting assignments and switch quickly between assignments as requiredltligtltligt2 years Experience working in an agile sprint teamltligtltligt2 years Prior experience with an HHS agencyltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtEducational Requirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt4 years Bachelors degree in Computer Science Information Systems or Business or equivalent experienceltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtPreferredltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtAWS Certified Machine Learning  Specialty certificationltligtltulgt
